name: @telamon/picostore
description: Magical redux-like state handler using picofeed blockchains

scripts.types: tsc --allowJs --checkJs --removeComments --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --lib es2022,dom --target es2022 --outFile index.js --moduleResolution nodenext index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: standard && npm test && npm run types

author: Tony Ivanov <telamohn@pm.me>
